nodes.text: Socorro sliders were one of the standard sliders on the menu at Dex's Diner on the planet Coruscant. Inspired by the planet Socorro, especially its black sands and the Killee Wasteland, they consisted of four pieces of crispy tailring bacon, the Monnok's smoky steak sauce and a blackened Mongo beefhead patty all on a trans-shipped medium-density food-board. They cost 6.7 credits.
